author: Nexcell Pride
text:
Awesome stream ever... Continuing with Minecraft.

This time was about to upgrading tools and weapons, followed to more diamonds 💎

But How many diamonds will Princess Rushia have obtained?  With so many diamonds there will be too many marriage proposals. 
💍💍💍💍💍

Again Rushia-hime is more lovely yet, she worked too hard with 2 streams in one day, but we saw her too happy. :_ハート::_きゅん:

And the question... Rushia is a Necromancer, but... Is she a Maiden or a Princess?
She would be an empress.
Can you imagine her? :_ちょうちょ::_ハート::_るんるん:
